mapper.select: SELECT bookshelf.isbn, appraisal.star, appraisal.book_comment, member.mem_id FROM appraisal INNER JOIN bookshelf ON bookshelf.book_status_num = appraisal.book_status_num INNER JOIN member ON bookshelf.mem_num = member.mem_num WHERE appraisal.co_prv='공개'
SELECT COUNT(appraisal.book_star) FROM appraisal INNER JOIN appraisal ON bookshelf.book_status_num = appraisal.book_status_num WHERE bookshelf.isbn=#{isbn} AND appraisal.co_prv='공개'
